projects.name: PetGrooming Website
projects.description: Designed UI/UX for the project, focusing on user experience and intuitive interface. Utilized ReactJS framework to build reusable components and ensure responsive design. Delivered a demo product with a user-friendly interface, optimized performance, and scalability for future features.

projects.name: CallCenter – Enterprise Communication System
projects.description: Contributed to UI/UX design, feature development, and system testing for a Call Center system. Enabled call management and integration with VoIP infrastructure.

projects.name: Motorbike Rental Management System
projects.description: Built the user interface using C# WinForms, including login, vehicle management, billing, and admin modules. Designed and implemented business logic for rental/return tracking and customer management. Managed SQL Server database and performed comprehensive testing to ensure smooth operation.

education.degree: Bachelor of Computer Networks and Data Communications
